overview: Although this Ethical Hacking & Cyber Security class focused on the practical side of Hacking, the theory behind every attack is also covered along with. Before jumping into Hacking, you will first learn how to set up a lab and install needed software to practice these hacking techniques on your own machine. All the attacks explained are launched against real devices in my Hacking Lab.

enroll: Lifetime access of LMS with videos & material
learn: Practical Cyber Security skills through hands on labs
The very latest up-to-date information and methods.
Start a career in cyber security. Become a cyber security specialist.
You will learn about nation state secret tracking and hacking infrastructure.
You will learn how to capture malicious traffic on your network.
You will learn to capture malware on your operating system.

why.title: Hacking is an attempt to exploit a computer system or a private network inside a computer.
To protect your device from malwares
The median salary for cybersecurity analysts in the US in 2020 was $102,600,
why.src: The US Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS)

forWho.que: Is this Cyber Warrior Course for you?
forWho.ans: This course is highly practical but won't neglect the theory, first you'll understand the inner-workings of each topic and each technique covered, then you'll learn how to apply it in real-life scenarios.If you want to explore Cyber Warrior safely. Then this course is for you.

companies.title: Companies you can expect when you get Cyber Warrior -certified with us

faq.que: How long will the Cyber Warrior course recordings be available?
faq.ans: All the Cyber Warrior training sessions along with the complete Cyber Warrior study material, POCs, and Cyber Warrior projects will be available for lifetime.

faq.que: What things do I need to learn Cyber Warrior through this course?
faq.ans: To attend this online Cyber Warrior training, you just need a laptop or a PC with a minimum 4GB RAM. Nothing else is required to learn it.

faq.que: How do I clear my Cyber Warrior related doubts?
faq.ans: You can post your queries on the discussion forum. Our support team will be happy to assist you.

faq.que: What are the system specifications required to learn Cyber Warrior?
faq.ans: The recommendation is a minimum of an i3 processor, a 20 GB disk, and a 4 GB RAM.

faq.que: What will the end result be of this online Cyber Warrior training course?
faq.ans: You will find your strengths. You can choose your career path. And finally you will get a certificate.

faq.que: Where do all the students come from?
faq.ans: We have a blend of students from across the globe. Apart from India, we provide training in the US, the UK, Singapore, Canada, UAE, France, Brazil, Ireland, Indonesia, Japan, Sri Lanka, and many others covering the globe.

faq.que: Is this Cyber Warrior training classroom-based or online?
faq.ans: This training is completely online and self-paced.

faq.que: Will you be providing Cyber Warrior certificate after the training?
How do I get in touch with you for further queries?
faq.ans: You are  to contact us by placing a call at +91-8451097879 or by dropping a mail to info@data-flair.training

faq.que: Can I attend a demo session?
faq.ans: Yes, you can attend the Cyber Warrior demo class recording on this course page itself to understand the quality of training we provide.
